channel.title: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?
channel.description:
http://www.pcworld.com/article/165944/five_things_i_want_to_know_about_project_natal.html
Seems like it's some full body X-Box 360 controller. This will probably rape the Wii imo.

item.title: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Man UTD Freak:

Maybe to you it is the biggest piece of fail ever made but some others may think differently.

People who don’t like games and think flailing around aimlessly with no challenge is fun?

Read full topic
item.source: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?

item.title: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:26, topic:281871”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=372488.msg2812070#msg2812070 date=1244058572]

You WOULDN’T be able to really play any shooter games with this. Crouching would be a pain, etc,.

So… you can’t crouch?

Fat people can’t crouch, don’t you remember?

So what io9 can’t crouch

But it yeah matrix would be cool, but the neck thing wow…
[/quote]
I was just thinking of io9 the fat people of the community.

And how would you shoot a gun?
Like this?
[/quote]
Heavy weapons guy style! POW!

Also lol: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IYFN_XwMCO8

Read full topic

item.title: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:23, topic:281871”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=372488.msg2813365#msg2813365 date=1244136039]
i would have to disagree with the latter, it may be true that fat kids play the playstations and xboxs but some schools actually use wii as their PE lessons for the fat kids i cant remember if it was here or america or even both im not sure but i know they used it
[/quote]
I see where you’re coming from but if fat kids are using the wii and right now only the wii actually makes people move, i bet money that they lost weight because of it making them not as fat as ps and xbox kids.[/quote]
This is true, maybe it should be as such: The Wii is for fat kids that want to change

Read full topic
item.source: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?

item.title: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

[quote=“spankjava, post:18, topic:281871”][quote author=Man UTD Freak link=topic=372488.msg2812927#msg2812927 date=1244099468]
This isn’t too bad although it does not beat the Wii. The Wii is too awesome to beat. Yeah, this may be revolutionary but it will soon get boring as everything else does but the Wii.
[/quote]

I got bored within a week of my wii[/quote]

Guess you shouldn’t have bought it then if it wasn’t to your satisfaction.

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:20, topic:281871”][quote author=Man UTD Freak link=topic=372488.msg2812927#msg2812927 date=1244099468]
This isn’t too bad although it does not beat the Wii. The Wii is too awesome to beat. Yeah, this may be revolutionary but it will soon get boring as everything else does but the Wii.
[/quote]

The Wii is the biggest piece of fail ever made. It’s for little kids and fat people who think they’ll lose weight doing wiiFit all day.[/quote]

Maybe to you it is the biggest piece of fail ever made but some others may think differently.

Read full topic
item.source: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?

item.description:

sanga282:

i would have to disagree with the latter, it may be true that fat kids play the playstations and xboxs but some schools actually use wii as their PE lessons for the fat kids i cant remember if it was here or america or even both im not sure but i know they used it

I see where you’re coming from but if fat kids are using the wii and right now only the wii actually makes people move, i bet money that they lost weight because of it making them not as fat as ps and xbox kids.

item.title: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:21, topic:281871”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=372488.msg2813203#msg2813203 date=1244130049]
The Wii is the biggest piece of fail ever made. It’s for little kids and fat people who think they’ll lose weight doing wiiFit all day.
[/quote]

I disagree, I’ve played a few of their games and it’s a pretty decent system especially since many times it brings the family and friends together unlike the other systems who didn’t start developing a way to move while playing until the wii came out. I would say the fat kids are the ones who play ps* and xbox*.[/quote]
i would have to disagree with the latter, it may be true that fat kids play the playstations and xboxs but some schools actually use wii as their PE lessons for the fat kids i cant remember if it was here or america or even both im not sure but i know they used it

item.title: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

The Wii is the biggest piece of fail ever made. It’s for little kids and fat people who think they’ll lose weight doing wiiFit all day.

I disagree, I’ve played a few of their games and it’s a pretty decent system especially since many times it brings the family and friends together unlike the other systems who didn’t start developing a way to move while playing until the wii came out. I would say the fat kids are the ones who play ps* and xbox*.

item.title: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:16, topic:281871”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=372488.msg2811620#msg2811620 date=1244041949]
because they never design anything themselves they’re a bunch of lazy ignorant american faggots who do everything half arsed.
[/quote]
You’re not going to bash Sony for making a motion controller too? As long as it isn’t multiple companies making rehashes, why should we care?[/quote]
I have already showed my displeasure at that, along with their mario kart clone. But why did I not mention this? Because this thread is about natal and not Sony

item.title: Project Natal - The Future of Gaming?
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:13, topic:281871”][quote author=Frostie21 link=topic=372488.msg2812359#msg2812359 date=1244066576]

its a jumped up eye toy woopdy friggin do

The eye toy was terrible so what does it matter. You complain too much sanga.
If it does all they promise and does it well, who cares if they’re ripping off the eye toy.

because they never design anything themselves they’re a bunch of lazy ignorant american faggots who do everything half arsed.

Wait you forgot to add how great Sony is.Pick it up PS3 fanboy.
[/quote]
What? Just because he dislikes Microsoft does not mean he is a “ps3 fanboy”.[/quote]

I was just joking,and he always used to talk about how superior the ps3 is to the x-box 360.

Read full topic
